LightningComponentBundle.description: Shows the user’s most recently viewed records in a compact SLDS timeline.

property.name: recordLimit
property.label: Number of recent records to show
property.description: How many of the user’s last‐viewed items to display

property.name: allowedObjects
property.label: Allowed Objects (comma‐separated)
property.description: Comma‐separated list of object API names to show (leave blank for all objects). e.g. Account,Contact,Custom__c

property.name: titleFieldsMapping
property.label: Title Field Overrides (semicolon‐separated)
property.description: Semicolon‐separated mapping of ObjectAPI:FieldAPI to use as the display title. e.g. Account:Phone;Custom__c:CustomField__c
